name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Raging Saiyan: Dynamic Goku Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browser with the Angry Goku Live Wallpaper, featuring a sleek design, shortcuts, clock, and dynamic Goku visuals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features of Angry Goku Live Wallpaper:
Dynamic Live Wallpaper: Animated Goku background for an immersive experience.
Minimalist Design: Clean, clutter-free interface for seamless browsing.
Clock and Date: Stay organized with a visible time and date display.
Quick Access Shortcuts: One-click links to popular websites.
Google Search Bar: Fast and convenient search functionality.
